basics.name: Binliu ZHANG
basics.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
summary: Self-driving front-end engineer with five years of experience in large-scale website development, proficient with JavaScript and web technologies, understanding Java, and skilled in using React eco-system tools to build high-performance front-end applications;
Data-driven, with two years of data middle-platform experience, can find problems from data and solve them. And have an acquaintance with A/B testing(especially UI experiments) and growth hacking.
Focus the Web trends, willingness to share, passion for exploring the best practices of front-end architecture, and practice new technologies to serve business and team.

description: Responsible for the front-end development of "Darwin" -- an internal one-stop A/B testing platform for Ant Group.

Designed and carried out the front-end of Darwin A/B testing platform and runtime experiment SDK in an all-around way to fulfill the UI experiments' value, implemented and perfected the full-link front-end A/B Testing solution from 0 to 1.
Covered all scenarios of front-end experiments of Ant Group, helping businesses to use A/B testing adequately, and boosted data-driven business optimization and growth.

Responsible for the development and maintenance of Map-Gaia front-end of Meituan's internal map data platform, and realized the functions of map data production, management, publishing, viewing/editing map POI data, etc., helping operations to edit better and maintain map data
Accomplished the platform front-end business logic by using `Vue` + `Vuex` + `ElementUI`

Implemented the map data-visualization: realized the function of displaying the map base layer and POI data by using Leaflet, achieved the customized map editing feature based on the custom development of `iD` editor.
highlights: Map
Data Platform

description: Responsible for the development and maintenance of PC & Mobile & Hybrid front-end pages of Douban, including Douban Movie, Douban Books, Douban Music, SNS, account system, etc. Implemented new features while continuously refactoring and optimizing, improved product iteration efficiency and user experience, and serving hundreds of millions of users.

Achieved the front-end development of the whole website account system (Mobile and Hybrid) by using `React`, integrated the Account system of Douban's multiple APP platforms(Douban APP, Douban Read, Douban FM, Douban Movie) and were compatible with multi-version and multi-system

projects.title: Darwin "Multi-terminal and Multi-domain": Open A/B Testing middle-platform from 0 to 1
projects.description: Developed Darwin A/B Testing Platform UI, and built the whole open SDK system (including Vanilla JS SDK and component SDK) from 0 to 1, providing a SaaS to other 10+ business groups, 100+ system in AntFinicial
highlights: Realized the *data-visualization*
**TechStack:** `TypeScript` + `React` + `AntDesign` + `AntV`

projects.title: Map-Gaia - A Data-Platform of Map
projects.description: The basic data platform of map (Web) is responsible for the development, including the functions of producing, managing and publishing map related data, and viewing/editing map POI data.
highlights: Use `Vue` to realize the basic business logic of map basic data platform SPA Web

Realize the visualization of map * * data * *: use Leaflet to realize the display function of map base map and POI data, and use iD editor for secondary development to realize the map editing function
**TechStack:** `Vue` + `Vuex` + `Leaflet` + `iD` + `Element-UI`

projects.title: Creator 创作者社区
projects.description: 负责开发的创作者社区平台（Web + Mobile + Hybrid），包括创作者作品申请、作品管理后台及创作者作品展示功能。
highlights: 使用 `React` + `Redux` 开发的Web + Mobile + Hybrid **多端SPA**，通过 Ajax 与后端进行所有数据通信；
使用`Redux` + `normalizr` + `Immutable.js` 作**状态管理**，实现复杂的页面交互；
技术栈： `React` + `React-Router` + `Redux` + `Webpack`

projects.title: Account System
projects.description: 负责开发的全站帐号系统移动端（Mobile + Hybrid），包括注册、找回密码、绑定 / 解绑用户帐号和第三方帐号登录功能。
highlights: 使用 `React` 开发的 Mobile + Hybrid 端 **SPA**， 统一了豆瓣多个 APP 平台（豆瓣、豆瓣阅读、豆瓣FM、豆瓣电影）的帐号系统，且多版本、多系统（iOS / Android）兼容；
使用 `Webpack` `code-splitting` 技术使各个功能的页面代码**按需加载**，页面打开时间减少了 20%，提高了用户体验；
模块化开发组件且加入**单元测试**，降低线上出错概率的同时提高了开发效率
使用 `jscodeshift` & `js-codemod` & `react-codemod` 将所有代码从 ES5 迁移到 ES6
技术栈：`React` + `React-Router` + `Webpack` + `Mocha` + `Chai` + `Enzyme` + `Sinon`

projects.title: Zerkalo 书影音条目长评
projects.description: 负责开发的传统 PC 页面重构，应用新设计重构豆瓣全站 Web 端条目，包括书影音、游戏、舞台剧等所有条目的长评页面，并加入长评赞赏新功能。
highlights: **三个月重构项目**，整合之前分散在五个大型项目中的长评 `Mako`模板代码，按页面模块布局拆分并基本重写了样式文件；
将之前超两千行的主站 `douban.js` 按功能模块拆分，使用 Vanilla JavaScript 重构需要的功能代码并`Webpack` 打包加载，提升页面的性能，方便调试和维护；
交互上把所有传统表单提交操作改为 Ajax 与后端通信，提升用户体验，并解决了多个项目不同域名下的 **CORS 跨域**问题；
技术栈：`Mako` + `SCSS` + `ES6` + `Webpack`

projects.title: Talion 豆瓣手机版
projects.description: 参与开发的移动版的豆瓣，具备 PC Web 有的基本功能
highlights: 对整个移动端进行了 **SEO** 和分享至微信的优化，给整站带来更多的流量及给用户更好的分享效果；
应用模块化、组件化思想开发传统移动端页面，广泛使用 `ES6 template literals` + `Fetch API` + `SCSS`，根据设计稿开发对应组件， 方便复用和快速生成页面，提高开发效率；
一些页面的 view 层通过自己编写 Python 调接口实现
技术栈：`Mako` + `SCSS` + `ES6` + `Python`

projects.title: 每日鸡血 Inspiring Me
projects.description: 一个带来每日正能量的页面，展示随机生成的鼓舞人心的图片和名人名言；
highlights: 技术栈： `React` + `styled-component` + `Webpack` + `Unsplash API`

projects.title: re-Resume 2.0
projects.description: 一个排版良好，具有设计感的响应式简历模板生成器；
highlights: 原子化组件，简洁、简单，支持高度自定义；
技术栈：`TypeScript` + `React`

projects.title: Ghost-render
projects.description: 一个使用 Ghost 及其默认主题 Casper 的静态博客生成器
highlights: 对生成博客文章链接格式进行了优化，并修复一些小 Bug
技术栈：`Node`

education.institution: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC)

prototype.name: Hobbies
description: Lifelong learners and keeps curiosity about the world
Have aesthetic design ability, obsessed with all beautiful designs
Amateurs like reading / taking pictures / listening to music, doing fitness and cooking
Life tenet: Work hard, play hard.

prototype.name: Quotes
description: Fake it till you make it.
God helps one who help themselves

thanks: I cherish every opportunity to make me better and look forward to working with you. Thank you for your precious time, and wish you success in your work.
